Uses of Class
nl.esciencecenter.neon.models.Model

  • Packages that use Model 
    Package Description
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.models
    Simple geometric models for use by the library.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.models.graphs
    Several ready-to-apply generic graph models.
    nl.esciencecenter.neon.text
    Package containing the classes needed to implement 3d and 2d text in jogl.

    • Uses of Model in nl.esciencecenter.neon.models

      Subclasses of Model in nl.esciencecenter.neon.models 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Axis
      Model for an Axis in space.
      class  Box
      Box implementation of the Model class.
      class  GeoSphere
      A sphere implementation based on a number of latitude and longitude divisions.
      class  InvertedGeoSphere
      A sphere implementation based on a number of latitude and longitude divisions.
      class  LeftBottomQuad
      A simple quad (square) Model.
      class  Line
      Model for a line in space.
      class  Quad
      A simple quad (square) Model.
      class  Sphere
      Sphere implementation (based on the code in the OpenGL red book) of the Model class implemented by subdivision of a regular isocahedron.
